About Me

AWS Certified and IBM Certified learner, I am an aspiring Data Engineer and Data Scientist with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Possessing a strong foundation in Electronics and Communication Engineering, I am currently pursuing a Master’s in Applied Data Science.

I have hands-on experience with Python, PySpark, Big Data, and various machine learning algorithms. My proven track record includes developing data-driven solutions such as personalized learning paths and implementing fraud detection for e-commerce security enhancements.
